rows.label: tlk70000026_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey... I'm sorry I kinda
broke down before...

rows.label: tlk70000026_03_msg0002
rows.name:
I'm still really upset,
but I'm trying to keep
busy doing whatever I can.

rows.label: tlk70000026_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Once I'm in a better frame
of mind, I think I'll make
the journey to Torigo.

rows.label: tlk70000026_03_msg0004
rows.name:
I just had so much I wanted
to ask my instructor...
